channel.title: Red Curries on Seasoned Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Red Curries on Seasoned Recipes

item.title: Duck Red Curry
item.description: This one quacks # Duck is a hero of a chicken right

item.title: Red Curry Paste
item.description: Skip to Method Ingredient Amount Red Chili 12 Peppercorns 1 tablespoon Corriander Seed 1 tablespoon Cumin Seed 1 teaspoon Shallot 2 Lemongrass 3 small sticks ~30g Ginger 5cm knob Garlic 3 cloves Carriander Root 2 Kaffir Lime Leaf 2 Thai Basil 1 small bunch Jeeny’s Shrimp Paste 1 tab Salt 1 teaspoon Method # Toast & Grind - Whole Spices # Put your black peppercorns, corriander seeds and cumin seeds in a hot dry pan and toast for a few minutes.

item.title: Red Curry Paste v.2
item.description: Skip to Method Ingredient Amount Red Chili 12 Peppercorns 11/2 tablespoons Corriander Seed 11/2 tablespoons Cumin Seed 11/2 teaspoons Shallot 2 Lemongrass 3 small sticks ~30g Ginger 5cm knob Garlic 3 cloves Carriander Root 2 Kaffir Lime Leaf 2 Thai Basil 1 small bunch Jeeny’s Shrimp Paste 1 tab Salt 1 teaspoon Method # Toast & Grind - Whole Spices # Put your black peppercorns, corriander seeds and cumin seeds in a hot dry pan and toast for a few minutes.
